column4: Hey everyone, anyone know how to discover if a processor is 64-bit? The sales-person said no, but I have a suspicion it is.
do you know what it is? if not what does 'grep model /proc/cpuinfo' tell you?
model name : Genuine Intel(R) CPU           T2080  @ 1.73GHz
modelmodel name : Genuine Intel(R) CPU           T2080  @ 1.73GHz
model name : Genuine Intel(R) CPU           T2080  @ 1.73GHz
that also says there are 64-bit versions of it.
oh well, guess this thing needs replacement in 2038 then :P
